VLC media player is a free and open-source, portable, cross-platform media player software

Fast Hardware Decoding

VLC has hardware decoding on most platforms. It supports 0-copy on the GPU and can fallback on software when required.

Plays all Format

All types of Videos, Music, Text file, etc

Advanced formats

Input Media, Input Formats, Miscellaneous.

Windows Requirement

  1. VLC runs on all versions of Windows, from Windows XP SP3 to the last version of Windows 10.

Mac OS X version

  1. VLC media player requires Mac OS X 10.7.5 or later.
  2. Previous devices are supported by older releases.

Supported releases

  1. Ubuntu 18.04 “Bionic Beaver.”
  2. Ubuntu 16.04 “Xenial Xerus.”

    3. Installation by Command line way.

  3. $ sudo snap install vlc
